name: Basketball Hoops!, Watch Game
description:
A tiny action/arcade game for kill your time while you increase your visual skills

Aim and tap to shot! Guess the correct shot angle and power with the onscreen trajectory visualizer and try to get as many atoms inside the basket box while you have time, you will be rewarder with more time for every catch and more points with streaks

The app plays standalone on the Apple Watch or while paired with an iPhone for Game Center features and It takes advantage of the Watch's unique Digital Crown and haptic feedback


FEATURES
• Minimalistic UI
• Smooth frame rate
• Responsive Analog Controls – turn the Digital Crown set the shot angle
• Unique gameplay
• Compete with friends for high scores with Game Center integration on Apple Watch.
• Plays standalone without iPhone.
